title: Hacked
body: Someone hacked me and changed my email I dont know how. And now I can't change my password because it sends code to his email. D:

replies.body:
Oh damn, that sucks! D:

We can definitely help you out if you reach out in a support ticket with [*this form*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Let me know if you encounter troubles submitting your ticket.
this also happen to me ive put a ticket up but no one responding
We're pretty slammed with tickets at the moment, due to the end of the season. A specialist will reach out in your ticket as soon as it's possible, we're not going to leave you behind. ^.^
It happend to me too yesterday they changed my password then username off my email Ive send a ticket to riot support but they havent responded
